title: Home
Start
tagTitle: *The blimp app has dropped at google play and is comming soon to iPhone!
*Blimp appen har släppts på google play och kommer snart till iPhone!

title: Go Explore!
Utforska världen!
desc: Your new travel companion! Blimp lets you place your mark on the map, get recommendations and review from locals and connect with the world!
Din nya resekompis! Blimp placerar dig på kartan, samtidigt som du får tips och rekommendationer från folk över hela världen!

title: Heads up!
Se upp!
desc: Share whats on your mind with the world, where it matters. Create a review, share a coupon code or share a fun story!
Dela dina tankar med världen, där de räknas. Skapa ett omdöme, dela en kupong kod eller dela en rolig historia!

title: Looks pretty rad right?
Ser väl bra ut!
desc: Get the app today and start exploring!
Skaffa appen idag och börja utforska!

title: Advertise
För Företag
first: Reach potential customers in your proximity. Blimp RADAR enable you to create geographic ad campaigns, save money and convert fast! Contact us for more information.
Nå ut till potentialla kunder i din närhet. Blimp RADAR låter dig driva geografiska reklamkampanjer, spara pengar och konvertera leads snabbt! Kontakta oss för mer information.

title: Contact
Kontakt
upper: Got a question or Feedback? Want to report a bug you found? We'd love to hear from you! Make sure to include your username if you need in-app help.
Got a question or Feedback? Want to report a bug you found? We'd love to hear from you! Make sure to include your username if you need in-app help.
